maqras.text: Glorifying DEUS est everything caelum everything terra; Rex the Multus Sanctus Almighty the Multus Wise
He est Unus sent to gentiles messenger ex them recite them His revelations purify them teach them scripture wisdom! Ante hoc they iit far astray
to multus generations subsequentis to them. He est Almighty Wise
Such est deus gratia ut He bestows whomever He testimentum! DEUS est Possessor Infinite GRATIA
example de those dedit Torah tunc failed uphold it est donkey carrying major works literature. Miserable indeed est example people rejected deus revelations. DEUS NON guide wicked people
dictus O vos est Judaicus vos claim ut vos est deus chosen to exclusion totus alius people tunc vos long decessus vos est truthful
They nunquam long it quod they committed DEUS est fully aware de the wicked
Dictus decessus vos est trying evade testimentum catch up cum vos sooner later Tunc vos returned Knower de totus secrets declarations tunc He inform vos de everything vos perfecit
O vos believe when Congregational Prayer (Salat Al-Jumu ah) announced on Dies, Veneris, vos hasten commemoration DEUS drop totus business Hoc est bene vos si vos unus knew
Dodum prayer perfecit vos spread terra seek deus bounties continue remember DEUS frequently ut vos succeed
When some de them advenit business deal some entertainment they rush it sinister vos standing Dictus Quod DEUS possesses est far bene than entertainment business DEUS EST BENE Provider
When hypocrites advenit vos they dictus Nos bear testis vos est messenger DEUS. DEUS knows ut vos est His messenger DEUS bears testis hypocrites est liars
Sub guise their apparent faith they repel people path DEUS. Miserable indeed est quod they perfecit
Hoc because they believed tunc disbelieved Ergo their minds blocked they non understand
